channel.title: [508] Please Read!
channel.description:
ok i need to fix it so when a bunch of players are fighting a boss the player who came in last always gets drop.
- i would like to change drops to random. so it will switch between players when a group is fighting.
how could a do this? what file do i edit?
Thanks in advance!
